<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[difficultyEnabled]], [[isObjectRTD]], [[Description.ext#forceRotorLibSimulation|forceRotorLibSimulation]]
</value></part></template>
